DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate superiority glycopyrrolate bromide ( CHF 5259 pMDI ) versus placebo top QVAR® pMDI , term lung function parameter , well assess safety .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy LAMA Added ICS Treatment Asthma
DOC.criteria: History asthma ≥ 5 year diagnose 40 year old Uncontrolled asthma lowmedium dos Inhaled CorticoSteroid ( ICS ) ACQ ( Asthma Control Questionnaire ) ≥1.5 Prebronchodilator FEV1 ≥40 % < 90 % predict normal value Positive reversibility test Pregnant lactate woman Diagnosis Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Patients treat asthma exacerbation 4 week prior study entry Patients therapy gastroesophageal reflux disease Patients clinically significant cardiovascular condition
